thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The most amazing hotel to stay in Paris
thread.title_full: The most amazing hotel to stay in Paris - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Annette R
title: The most amazing hotel to stay in Paris
text:
This hotel is well located, just opposite Réaumur – Sébastopol Metro station...it only take 11 mins to get here from Gare du Nord!
The room we stayed in was well furnished with comfortable beds and the toiletries are from L'occitane! Breakfast is a variety of everything you need and there are little treats and coffee that is complimentary throughout the day!
This was by far the best service we have received from any hotel that we've stayed at. Hedi and his team made our weekend away in Paris a truly special and memorable one.
Mostafa was especially helpful and welcoming during our stay - please extend our thanks to him and the rest of the team!
From a very happy and grateful trio from London!
